full_text: fl iq Digeaeras IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT HERNAKULAM 2018/KER/268 PRESENT: THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE B.KEMAL PASHA THURSDAY, THE 4TH DAY OF JANUARY 2018 / 14TH POUSHA, 1939 Cr1.MC.No. 8812 of 2017 CC. NO.702/2014 OF JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE COURT-I, CHERTHALA. CRIME NO. 764/2013 OF PATTANAKAD POLICE STATION, ALAPPUZHA DISTRICT. PETITIONER/ACCUSED: RAJEESH, S/O RAVEENDRAN NAIR, AGED 36, PULIMOODVELI HOUSE, PATTANAKAD P.O, PATTANAKAD P/W-7, CHERTHALA, ALAPPUZHA. BY ADVS.SRI.P.ANUROOP, SMT .V.K.SREENA. RESPONDENTS/STATE/DEFACTO COMPLAINANT. : 1. STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY S.I. OF POLICE, PATTANAKAD, THROUGH PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM. 2. RAJAN, S/O VELUPANICKER, AGED 69, RADHA NIVAS, PATTANAKAD P/W NO-4, CHERTHALA, ALAPPUZHA. R1 BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR SRI.C.S. HRITHWIK. R2 BY ADV. SRI.SEBASTIAN JOSEPH (KURISUMMOOTTIL) THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 04-01-2018, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING : rs. ates 2018/KER/268 Crl1.MC.No. 8812 of 2017 () APPENDIX PETITIONER'S ANNEXURES: ANNEUXRE AL CERTIFIED COPY OF THE FIR IN PATTANAKAD POLICE STATION CRIME NO.764/13 DATED 25.09.2013. ANNEXURE A2 CERTIFIED COPY OF FINAL REPORT. ANNEXURE A3 COPY OF COMPROMISE DATED 06.07.2017. ANNEXURE A4 AFFIDAVIT OF THE 2ND RESPONDENT. RESPONDENT'S ANNEXURES: NIL. //TRUE COPY// P.S. TO JUDGE rs. 2018/KER/268 B.KEMAL PASHA, J. Dated this the 4" day of January, 2018 ORDER Petitioner is the accused in C.C.No.702 of 2014 of the Judicial First Class Magistrates Court-l, Cherthala, which has arisen from Crime No.764 of 2013 of the Pattanakadu Police Station, registered for the offences punishable under Sections 447 and 427 IPC read with Section 34 IPC. 2. It seems that the matter has been amicably seitled between the parties. 3. On going through the facts and circumstances of the case, it seems that the matter can be permitted to be settled. It has been reported that no criminal antecedents have been reported against the petitioner. The defacto complainant has filed Annexure-A4 affidavit affirming that the matter has been amicably settled between him and the petitioner and he has no complaints against the petitioner. Considering the fact that the matter has already been settled amicably between the parties, this court is satisfied that no eee aie 2018/KER/268 Crl.M.C.No.8412 of 2017 2 purpose would be served in proceeding with the trial of the case. Matters being so, Annexure-A11 First Information Report, Annexure-A2 Final Report and all further proceedings in C.C.No.702 of 2014 of the Judicial First Class Magistrates Court-l, Cherthala, which has arisen from Crime No.764 of 2013 of the Pattanakadu Police Station, as against the petitioner, are liable to be quashed. In the result, this Crl.M.C. is allowed and Annexure-A1 First Information Report, Annexure-A2 Final Report and all further proceedings in C.C.No.702 of 2014 of the Judicial First Class Magistrates Court-l, Cherthala, which has arisen from Crime No.764 of 2013 of the Pattanakadu Police Station, as against the petitioner, are hereby quashed. Sd/- B.KEMAL PASHA JUDGE DSV/A/1/18 //True Copy // P.A.To Judge
